job_description:
Fintel Connect is making waves as the leading growth marketing solution built for the financial industry. Our mission is to support the banking and financial ecosystem with tools and insights that will allow them to better reach future customers and deliver the right products to the right audiences in a compliant and cost-effective way. Fintel proudly serves 80+ leading financial brands like Royal Bank of Canada, Tangerine, Ramp, and Neo Financial to name a few.

About the Role:
Fintel Connect is seeking an experienced Senior Software Developer to join our growing team. You’ll be a critical point of contact for both internal and external stakeholders, with a focus on delivering timely solutions, and adapting strategies to ensure expectations are met. You are a natural problem solver always looking for way to reach the goals of the department and business.
With a deep understanding of Fintel Connect technology, you are at the centre of the Internal Development team, with a focus on innovation and the application of data analysis and machine learning techniques. You will collaborate closely with the lead developer to ensure all technical team members deliver on the yearly roadmap.

What we offer:

Competitive base salary
A rapidly growing organization with opportunities for career advancement
Comprehensive health and wellness benefits
Demonstrated work/life balance
5 Paid personal days
Paid volunteer hours
Team events & activities
Business casual dress code

What you'll get to do:
Development

Strong team player, working well with other technical team members to reach department goals
Manage-up with any perceived challenges, roadblocks or issues with development or the product
Write high-quality, detailed and precise technical documentation
Decompose highly complex problem statements into specific deliverables and requirements
Implement easy-to-read ‘clean’ code, while employing industry standard best practices
Contribute to the architecture and design of the platform to enable rapid development, autonomous testing, and innovative integrations in a continuous delivery environment
Use your creative and innovation-driven mindset to articulate engineering strategies related to scale, performance, security, and usability
Data Analysis

An understanding of Python, statistical and text-based analysis
Ensuring data assets, usage recommendations, and known issues are thoroughly documented
Leverage metrics, historical data trend analysis, and identification of opportunities to drive continuous improvement
Monitor the quality of data and information, report on results, and identify and recommend system application changes required to improve the quality of data in all applications

Our web application stack:
Database: MongoDB
Back-end: Express (NodeJS runtime environment)
Front-end: React
APIs: Graph (Apollo)

Our data application stack:
Database: Postgres
Data Analytics: Pandas (Python)

Our infrastructure:
Cloud Platform: AWS
Containers (ECS), Server less (Lambda)
Management: Terraform
Authentication: Auth0
Monitoring: Sentry.io
SDLC: GitHub, Jira

What we're looking for:

8-10+ years of professional software development experience
Deep understanding of JavaScript (React, NodeJS) and Amazon Web Services (ECS, Lambda)
Deep understanding of databases (NoSQL and SQL [MongoDB, Postgres])
Experience with infrastructure and operations for a B2B SaaS and Data Analytics platforms
Strong problem-solving, decision making, and conflict-resolution abilities
Excellent written and oral communication skills, with the ability to establish and maintain effective working relationships with various levels of management, staff, and external clients

Why Join Fintel Connect?

Career progression: We value personal and professional growth and offer various internal and external development training programs and opportunities for advancement.
Health and wellbeing: We believe in work-life balance and offer comprehensive health and wellness benefits, sick/personal days, and three weeks annual paid vacation.
Cultural environment: We foster a positive environment through team events, activities, and paid volunteer hours.
